divs: sighting detailssimple event, sorry i don't have more details. we were driving south on northbend rd near i74 interchange. time was approx 9:30 pm. and saw directly overhead an orange \ red sphere with a cone shaped side. it was travelling slow from east to west and then dropped quickly out of sight. believe it descended. two adults, two teens and 3 kids saw it. kids panicked, i told them it was a hot air baloon. kids stated it appeared to have a flames on it. i told them it was a "hot air balloon on fire". there was nothing on the news as i've checked. i know others saw it as i saw people pointing and looking up in amazement.
trends: There have been 82 other sightings in Cincinnati
There were no other sightings in Cincinnati on or around June 21st 2007
